alert.note: Alert for Fairfield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 4:47PM EDT until June 16 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Fairfield County in central South Carolina... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 446 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blackstock, or 10 miles south of Chester, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Winnsboro, VC Summer Nuclear Station, Fairfield County Airport, Monticello, Blackstock, Ridgeway, Rion, Winnsboro Mills, Fairfield Elementary School, Lebanon Fire Station, White Oak and Fairfield County Detention Center. This includes Interstate 77 between mile markers 33 and 50. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
